welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Salinas, Brazil! Get ready to experience the warm hospitality and vibrant culture of this charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and delicious seafood. We invite you to immerse yourself in all Salinas has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

restaurants.name: Empanadas Santa Fé
restaurants.description: Empanadas Santa Fé is a empanada restaurant located in Salinas.
restaurants.address: Ruta Interbalnearia km 38 (e/ Av. Julieta y Arazá), Salinas Canelones

restaurants.address: Av Artigas (al final) (Desembocadura del Arroyo Pando), 15003 Pinar Sur Canelones
